title: Disconnect issues
body:
Hey guys.

I recently have been having a very weird dc problem with league.

I have searched everywhere for a solution but no luck.

What happens is, every single game, no exceptions, I disconnect about 3-4 times BEFORE the 1:30min mark.

It's annoying as f***, and when my team or the enemy team invades, I am completely useless.

After the 1:30min mark the whole game is super smooth, and I don't even get lag spikes.

If anyone knows why, or have an idea I would appreciate it so much
Thanks! :)

replies.body: It sounds like your network is having trouble staying connected, and kicking you off.  It looks like an entire loss of connection, otherwise you would see input delays instead of getting kicked off entirely.  I recommend using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help get this fixed.  Let me know if you have any questions.

Thanks for the reply :).

Could this be due using a wireless connection? I know its much better to use a wired one, but I don't have access to that at the moment.
And do you know why the disconnect only happens in the beginning of the match?

Thanks again

It could certainly be an issue, if your connection isn't strong enough to communicate all the information coming in and out once the match starts.  Your current status may simply not be strong enough to withstand that constant communication until it's resolved.  Best of luck!

It's odd because I have a really good wifi adapter. I'm going to try a ethernet cable soon or contact my ISP. 

Thanks Porocles
